name: Addermarch Campaign - Session 18
tagline: in which the party clears the barracks and descends into a blocked mine
shortSummary: At Serethwyn Tor, the party clears fire-resistant skeletons from the officer's barracks, discovers signs of ancient burning and ranger dead, finds what appears to be Duncan's camp, and fights skeletons and serpentine wights near an intentionally collapsed mine passage before taking a long rest underground.
longSummary: Continuing their exploration of Serethwyn Tor, Drou, Fazoth, and Yvan fight through the officer's barracks, discovering that some skeletons resist fire and that the undead explode into dangerous shards when destroyed. After a short rest and a search that turns up evidence of old fire damage, possible ranger bodies under collapsed stone, and Avatus' symbol on rusting gear, they move to the mine entrance and locate what appears to be Duncan's camp in a nearby work shed. Inside the mine, they follow the main tunnel to a massive cave-in that looks intentional; there they clash with more undead, including serpentine wights, until Drou's hypnotic pattern and a unicorn summoned by Yvan's wild magic swing the fight. With the upper mine chambers briefly quiet and fresh footprints suggesting another route in and out, the party settles in to rest, ending the session in the mine the next morning.

npcs.name: Duncan of Haldrenn
npcs.notes: Missing shepherd; evidence of his presence is found near the mine entrance, and his footprints are suspected deeper inside.

npcs.name: Fazoth's pseudodragon
npcs.notes: Scouts ahead in the mine and is killed by serpentine wights.

npcs.name: Summoned unicorn
npcs.notes: Appears via Yvan's wild magic surge during the mine fight, helps destroy undead and indicates the upper mine chambers are safe to rest in.
